text: usane kaha, "mujhe to yah mere apane vyaktigat gyaan ke kaaran mila hai." kya usane yah nahin jaana ki allaah usase pahale kitanee hee naslon ko vinasht kar chuka hai jo shakti mein usase badh-chadhakar aur baahuly mein usase adhik theen? aparaadhiyon se to (unakee tabaahee ke samay) unake gunaahon ke vishay mein poochha bhee nahin jaata
